divs: sighting detailsat 0630 cst, i had just backed into a parking space at my work. i had about 10 minutes until time to clock in , so i was sitting in my vehicle smoking one last cigarette. i was looking south\ south easternly when a slight movement caught my eye towards the east. as i looked over i saw an object, like a unsharpened pencil, moving through the sky. the moon was just a sliver cresent, and the sun was not up yet. the object just moved along, at no great speed, and no up or down movement was detected. the object moved slightly under the cresent moon, in a northernly direction, and was a few inches in lenght at arms length. it continued moving in a straight line for approx the 3 minutes that i could see it , until the roof line of the warehouse blocked my view. the object was dark in volro, brownish black. i just sat there watching it, not sure of what is was. it made no sound that i could here.
Summary: long flat rectangle shape, like an unsharpened pencil
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Fort Smith
